title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 497.3 - Residence requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 497.3 - Residence requirements

State Regulations

Persons appointed to positions (other than stenographic
or clerical) on the permanent staff of a district office shall, within 60 days
subsequent to permanent appointment, establish residence within 30 miles of the
permanent district office location to which they are
appointed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
497.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
